Gentl emen:
I am a member of a committee of the Graduate
Department of the College of Education of West Virginia
University. The express purpose of this group is to
assimilate and evaluate information concerning the
"Dispensing of Educational and Occupational Information
Through Television."
In the process of gathering this information,
you were mentioned a:s an invaluable source. If you would
forward me any and all available data, it would be of
tremendous value in this research.
I would like to thank you in advance for any
attention you may give the above mentioned request.
Very truly yours,
1.
James W. Assad
525 Water Street
Brownsville, Pa.
